about_the_game:
YOU ARE A FAN OF MIT AIA AND YOU TRIED TO REVIVE HIM IN THE FAVELA WHERE YOU LIVE WITH A PENTAGRAM ONLY THAT IT WAS PROBLEMS AND YOU OPENED A PORTAL TO HELL UNROLL IT NOW TO CLOSE THE PORTAL

THIS DEMO CONTAINS 5 STAGES, BUY THE FULL GAME TO GET THE 17 TOTAL STAGES AND ACCESS TO FUTURE NEW STAGES

content_descriptors.notes: Fantasy Violence and Gore, low poly

detailed_description:
YOU ARE A FAN OF MIT AIA AND YOU TRIED TO REVIVE HIM IN THE FAVELA WHERE YOU LIVE WITH A PENTAGRAM ONLY THAT IT WAS PROBLEMS AND YOU OPENED A PORTAL TO HELL UNROLL IT NOW TO CLOSE THE PORTAL

THIS DEMO CONTAINS 5 STAGES, BUY THE FULL GAME TO GET THE 17 TOTAL STAGES AND ACCESS TO FUTURE NEW STAGES
